BadgeDetail.Name: Team Player
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they enjoy and value collaborating and learning with their peers. During induction, they have shown they can work well with others to complete a task.

Task.Title: The task
Task.Body: Describe a task where you worked effectively as a team member. Within that task, what did you do? Mention any examples of how you helped to resolve conflict, boosted the team's morale and/or supported/encouraged another member of your team.
Task.HtmlBody: Describe a task where you worked effectively as a team member. Within that task, what did you do? Mention any examples of how you helped to resolve conflict, boosted the team's morale and/or supported/encouraged another member of your team.
Task.TextileBody: Describe a task where you worked effectively as a team member. Within that task, what did you do? Mention any examples of how you helped to resolve conflict, boosted the team's morale and/or supported/encouraged another member of your team.

Task.Title: The feedback
Task.Body: Upload a video / audio testimonial of a team member on the same task describing how you worked as a team member. They may like to comment on what strengths you brought to the team, how well you worked with others, and what support you gave to the team members.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a video / audio testimonial of a team member on the same task describing how you worked as a team member. They may like to comment on what strengths you brought to the team, how well you worked with others, and what support you gave to the team members.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a video / audio testimonial of a team member on the same task describing how you worked as a team member. They may like to comment on what strengths you brought to the team, how well you worked with others, and what support you gave to the team members.
